name: XRSession.end
description: The end() method shuts down the XRSession on which it's called, returning a promise which resolves once the session has fully shut down.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

Theend()method shuts down the XRSessionon which it's called, returning a promise which resolves once the session has fully shut down.
